Recent Doc Updates

6-January-2023

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Creating Ingest Profiles for Context Aware Encoding
  • Description: Added note that the dynamic_profile_options block must be less than 8000 characters
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/admin/creating-ingest-profiles-context-aware-encoding.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Ingest Profiles

Minor updates

  • Title: Performance Report Reference
  • Description: Added note that Today is not supported as a date range for the Viewers dimension
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/performance-report-reference.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Analytics
  • Title: Using Reference IDs
  • Description: Added note on characters that are not allowed in reference ids
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/publish/using-reference-ids.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Publishing Videos

16-December-2022

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Viewing Channel Output and Analytics
  • Description: Added better explanation of dropped frames and the live input status icon
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/viewing-channel-output-and-analytics.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Cloud Playout

Minor updates

9-December-2022

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Managing Slates
  • Description: Added notes clarifying that Cloud Playout slates are used only for Hard Starts and to fill live event time when there is no live input stream, and are not used to fill unused ad slot time (that is a different slate configured via Live SSAI setting.)
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/managing-slates.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Cloud Playout

Minor updates

2-December-2022

New Docs

Major updates

  • Title: Domains and Ports that Must Be Accessible to Video Cloud
  • Description: Added a note explaining that managed player releases may break content security policies and options if that is a problem for your network.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/general/architecture/domains-and-ports-must-be-accessible-video-cloud.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Architecture
